features: NATURALLY SOURCED INGREDIENTS: Formulated with 98.7% naturally sourced ingredients* including oat to soothe a dry scalp
HIGH PERFORMANCE: Enriched with soy protein to add suppleness, shine and volume
NO ADDED FRAGRANCE: ideal for people sensitive to fragrances
body.description: Revitalize your hair every day with ATTITUDE Volume & Shine conditioner. Developed for delicate scalps, this vegan conditioner is formulated with 98.7% naturally sourced ingredients* including oat to soothe a dry scalp. Soy protein adds suppleness, shine and volume and leaves hair vibrant and easy to manage. Its vegan and dermatologically tested formula with no added fragrance is ideal for people sensitive to fragrances. Don’t miss out on this hair care essential. * According to ISO 16128.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This oat based conditioner is very creamy with a pleasant scent. Works well for my hair as an extra conditioning treatment. I use it as a leave on and don’t rinse out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great. Doesn't smell like feet anymore.
reviews.reviewText: I have baby fine, thin straight hair and I'm also chemically sensitive. Trying to find a fragrance free conditioner that doesn't weigh my hair down has been difficult.This works really well - easy to work through my hair, easy to rinse out, eliminates tangles, but LORDY! The SMELL! It seriously smells like dirty feet. I have to hold my breath until I get it rinsed out.I guess this is why so many "unscented" products have "masking fragrance" in them.I'll keep buying it because it works so well, but I sure hope the next tube smells better.ETA: Just started on my second tube and I'm happy to say that this one has no odor/fragrance at all, so I felt good about adding another star.I'm just going to assume the smelly tube was from a bad batch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like that it’s unscented
reviews.reviewText: Ingredients sound healthy for hair and it’s moderately moisturizing as well as unscented.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has no scent.
reviews.reviewText: i'm particularly sensitive to scents that are too strong and linger, especially if i have to put them on my body. i can't get away from myself! try to find unscented hair products; there are few to pick from that you would want to use again and are truely unscented. however this conditioner [and the shampoo] are totally unscented and the conditioner is nice and creamy and does a good job on my grey hair, which is really dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner left my hair soft and not frizzy but there is no shine. Therefore, I cannot recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an excellent product
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. Unscented, moisturizing and gives my hair bounce and shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT SHAMPOO AND CONDITIONER
reviews.reviewText: This product is perfect if you are looking for an unscented , nice lather and great conditioner. It has all of the right stuff in it and none of the bad! I will never use anything else! Also great for curly hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My HOLY GRAIL hair conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: I have wavy, thick, shoulder length hair, and a very sensitive scalp. I’ve tried everything from unscented, natural conditioner, bars to doctor recommended unscented Vanni cream conditioner, and felt like I was never going to find the right conditioner for me. I was never happy with any of the previous products I tried, because I felt like they did not hydrate my hair enough or would leave some weird film on my scalp or hair. I was scrolling TikTok one day and saw someone recommend this hair conditioner, so I ordered it immediately. I am so happy that this product exists! It does not irritate my sensitive scalp at all and provides just the right amount of hydration for my hair, which is low porosity by the way. I’d highly recommend that you try this product if you were interested in this , I really don’t think you’ll be disappointed
This is very nice. No scent at all. I use it twice a week and it's gives me plenty of moisturization. A good sized tube, well worth the money. I would purchase again.
This product is definitely unscented. Absolutely no smell at all which I love but unfortunately it leaves my fine hair still tangled.
It was very nice and moisturizing for my hair.

This is exactly what I was looking for. The smell of the product is of the actual ingredients sourced to formulate it. Not a fragrance but more of a natural smell that some may not like. I much prefer this formulation, even if sometimes I find the smell a bit off putting. The product is excellent and I will be buying it from now on as my regular hair conditionner. A Canadian company that makes excellent products overall.
